add_area.title: Area
add_area.description: Add parks, buildings, lakes or other areas to the map.
add_area.tail: Click on the map to start drawing an area, like a park, lake, or building.

add_line.title: Line
add_line.description: Add roads, streets, footpaths, canals or other lines to the map.
add_line.tail: Click on the map to start drawing a road, path, or route.

add_point.title: Point
add_point.description: Add restaurants, monuments, post boxes or other points to the map.
add_point.tail: Click on the map to add a point.

annotation.vertex: Added a node to a way.

rotate.description: Rotate this object around its centre point.

gpx.drag_drop: Drag and drop a .gpx file on the page, or click the button to the right to browse

lines.add: Lines are used to represent features such as roads, railways and rivers. **Click the Line button to add a new line.**

amenity/fuel.name: Petrol Station
amenity/fuel.terms: gas, fuel, propane, diesel, lng, cng, biodiesel
